question: A farmer has 1.5 hectares of land of which he grows crops in 1 hectare and rest of the land is used for cattle rearing and a small poultry farm. The operational land holding of this farmer is __:
explanation: Operational Land Holdings include only those units which are used either in farm production or farm production + livestock and poultry products (primary) and/or pisciculture or for only livestock and poultry products (primary) and/or pisciculture. Since total land is more than 1 hectare and less than 2 hectares; the operational land holding is small holding.
